018package org.opengis.metadata.identification;
019
020import org.opengis.util.CodeList;
021import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
022import org.opengis.geoapi.internal.Vocabulary;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.CONDITIONAL;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.ISO_19115;
026
027
028/**
029 * Type of aggregation activity in which datasets are related
030 *
031 * @author  Ely Conn (Leica Geosystems Geospatial Imaging, LLC)
032 * @version 3.1
033 * @since   2.1
034 */
035@Vocabulary(capacity=15)
036@UML(identifier="DS_InitiativeTypeCode", specification=ISO_19115)
037public final class InitiativeType extends CodeList<InitiativeType>{
038    /**
039     * Serial number for compatibility with different versions.
040     */
041    private static final long serialVersionUID = -6875282680499638030L;
042
043    /**
044     * Series of organized planned actions.
045     */
046    @UML(identifier="campaign", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
047    public static final InitiativeType CAMPAIGN = new InitiativeType("CAMPAIGN");
048
049    /**
050     * Accumulation of datasets assembled for a specific purpose.
051     */
052    @UML(identifier="collection", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
053    public static final InitiativeType COLLECTION = new InitiativeType("COLLECTION");
054
055    /**
056     * Specific performance of a function or group of functions.
057     */
058    @UML(identifier="exercise", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
059    public static final InitiativeType EXERCISE = new InitiativeType("EXERCISE");
060
061    /**
062     * Process designed to find if something is effective or valid.
063     */
064    @UML(identifier="experiment", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
065    public static final InitiativeType EXPERIMENT = new InitiativeType("EXPERIMENT");
066
067    /**
068     * Search or systematic inquiry.
069     */
070    @UML(identifier="investigation", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
071    public static final InitiativeType INVESTIGATION = new InitiativeType("INVESTIGATION");
072
073    /**
074     * Specific operation of a data collection system.
075     */
076    @UML(identifier="mission", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
077    public static final InitiativeType MISSION = new InitiativeType("MISSION");
078
079    /**
080     * Device or piece of equipment which detects or records.
081     */
082    @UML(identifier="sensor", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
083    public static final InitiativeType SENSOR = new InitiativeType("SENSOR");
084
085    /**
086     * Action that is part of a series of actions.
087     */
088    @UML(identifier="operation", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
089    public static final InitiativeType OPERATION = new InitiativeType("OPERATION");
090
091    /**
092     * Vehicle or other support base that holds a sensor.
093     */
094    @UML(identifier="platform", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
095    public static final InitiativeType PLATFORM = new InitiativeType("PLATFORM");
096
097    /**
098     * Method of doing something involving a number of steps.
099     */
100    @UML(identifier="process", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
101    public static final InitiativeType PROCESS = new InitiativeType("PROCESS");
102
103    /**
104     * Specific planned activity.
105     */
106    @UML(identifier="program", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
107    public static final InitiativeType PROGRAM = new InitiativeType("PROGRAM");
108
109    /**
110     * Organized undertaking, research, or development.
111     */
112    @UML(identifier="project", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
113    public static final InitiativeType PROJECT = new InitiativeType("PROJECT");
114
115    /**
116     * Examination or investigation.
117     */
118    @UML(identifier="study", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
119    public static final InitiativeType STUDY = new InitiativeType("STUDY");
120
121    /**
122     * Piece of work.
123     */
124    @UML(identifier="task", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
125    public static final InitiativeType TASK = new InitiativeType("TASK");
126
127    /**
128     * Process of testing to discover or demonstrate something.
129     */
130    @UML(identifier="trial", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
131    public static final InitiativeType TRIAL = new InitiativeType("TRIAL");
132
133    /**
134     * Constructs an element of the given name.
135     *
136     * @param name  the name of the new element. This name shall not be in use by another element of this type.
137     */
138    private InitiativeType(final String name) {
139        super(name);
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Returns the list of {@code InitiativeType}s.
144     *
145     * @return the list of codes declared in the current JVM.
146     */
147    public static InitiativeType[] values() {
148        return values(InitiativeType.class);
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Returns the list of codes of the same kind as this code list element.
153     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that
154     * this method can be invoked on an instance of the parent {@code CodeList} class.
155     *
156     * @return all code {@linkplain #values() values} for this code list.
157     */
158    @Override
159    public InitiativeType[] family() {
160        return values();
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Returns the initiative type that matches the given string, or returns a new one if none match it.
165     * This methods returns the first instance (in declaration order) for which the {@linkplain #name() name}
166     * is {@linkplain String#equalsIgnoreCase(String) equals, ignoring case}, to the given name.
167     * If no existing instance is found, then a new one is created for the given name.
168     *
169     * @param  code  the name of the code to fetch or to create.
170     * @return a code matching the given name.
171     */
172    public static InitiativeType valueOf(String code) {
173        return valueOf(InitiativeType.class, code, InitiativeType::new).get();
174    }
175}
